description: This dashboard will help you on maintaining a good TCO (Total Cost of Ownership) for your K8s cluster. You can analyse the overall resources usage Vs request and you can tweak the application resources accordingly.

Per cluster CPU & Memory Analysis - Table

panels.description:
This table will give you an overview of CPU usage per k8s Namespaces. The current table is more focused on request, you can similar columns for other data based on your requirement. 

You can analyse the AVG CPU request usage percentage and based on that you can tweak the application. If the AVG usage is very low you are over provisioning you K8s cluster. You can reduce the request to reduce the node count, and total cost.

properties.value: AVG CPU Request Usage Over Selected Time

matcher.options: AVG CPU Request Usage Over Selected Time

panels.title: CPU Analysis Per NameSpace

panels.description:
This table will give you an overview of Memory usage per k8s Namespaces. The current table is more focused on request, you can similar columns for other data based on your requirement. 

You can analyse the AVG Memory request usage percentage and based on that you can tweak the application. If the AVG usage is very low you are over provisioning you K8s cluster. You can reduce the request to reduce the node count, and total cost.
panels.title: Memory Analysis Per K8s Namespace
